spec_data.Name: perl-CPAN-Perl-Releases
spec_data.Description:
CPAN::Perl::Releases is a module that contains the mappings of all perl
releases that have been uploaded to CPAN to the authors/id/ path that the
tarballs reside in.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 25 Sep 2017 03:05:59 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Mapping Perl releases on CPAN to the location of the tarballs
